eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyName: Chrysanthemum Tea with Dried Tangerine Peels
storyInfo: Four decades ago, news of the True Lung's death sent shockwaves throughout Yan. One rainy spring night, a prince and a scholar hurried their families out of Baizao.

attributes.text: Sir, are you saying such a remarkable individual actually existed in the history of Great Yan?
Cataloging books, organizing texts, promoting education... if she did so much for all life under Heaven, why does no one remember her, or even know her name?
Sir, can you identify this character? I don't believe I've ever encountered it before.
It's not that no one remembers her. It's simply that her 'true name in one lone word' was never recorded in the history books.
Isn't it a pity? Her pen captured Great Yan's long history and vast expanse, yet not a single page in the historical records bears her name.
Sir, if I were to complete all the missing records, do you think I could reconstruct her image?

attributes.content: <p=2>April 21st, 1062      Guyu (Grain Rain)</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Sir, sir!
attributes.name: Hawking Shopworker

attributes.content: It's raining so hard out there. Why not come inside, have a pot of nice, warm tea, and wait out the rain?
attributes.name: Hawking Shopworker

attributes.content: No need. This rain won't be stopping anytime soon—I should keep moving.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: Haha. Some people want the rain to stop, some hope it carries on.
attributes.name: Hawking Shopworker

attributes.content: The umbrella vendor is smiling from ear to ear, but the passersby are downright miserable.
attributes.name: Hawking Shopworker

attributes.content: A fascinating thought...
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: Friend, you should take a moment to rest. I was asked to remind you: the road ahead is rough and uneven. A certain someone worries you might misstep, and get your shoes wet.
attributes.name: Hawking Shopworker

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: Please just follow me, sir. Your friend is already waiting for you inside.
attributes.name: Hawking Shopworker

attributes.content: High Minister... it's been a while.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: No... These days, you're... the Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: It has been some time indeed, since we bid each other farewell in Yumen.
I expected to meet with the Sui Regulator and the Ministry of War first upon this return to the capital to deliver my report.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: That's why I've arranged to meet with you in advance.
His Imperial Majesty... has passed.
When?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Two weeks ago.
I think... if His Majesty had died of natural causes, you would not be coming to see me about it.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Does this mean...?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: The man sitting in the shadows holds out his hand. A black weiqi stone rests in his palm.
Sixty years ago, he escaped from that ancient temple and turned himself into one hundred eighty-one black weiqi stones, which scattered across the lands. Their current whereabouts are unknown.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Two weeks ago, the Sui Regulator found this stone in the capital.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: What... has he done?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: I do not know.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The only thing I'm certain of is that he could not have entered the Forbidden City... someone must have gone out to meet him.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Investigating this person's identity would be... sensitive.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: His machinations likely will not involve others.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: I shouldn't have come to you today, but when the convict caused all this turmoil before, you were the one who subdued him.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Grandmaster, do you know anything of this?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Not a thing...
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: I have not seen him, since the incident.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Then I believe you, Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Do you need anything from me?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Do not linger here. Return to Yumen at once.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Ursus is in constant turmoil, and there is a changing of the guard in Yumen. We must not allow morale to be shaken.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I will handle the Sui Regulator and the Ministry of War myself. It is precisely because you are not entangled in this affair that I can entrust you with such a crucial task.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: I will see the Sui Regulator continue to investigate the weiqi matter in secret.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: During this crucial time, you should remain out of sight, Grandmaster. We did not meet here today.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Regarding the True Lung... how is His Highness Yan Wu?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: At this moment, he should be—
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Yan Wu...
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yan Wu was the one who went to His Imperial Majesty... on the night he died.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Your Highness, twenty-eight members of the traitor's family have been imprisoned.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: But after we checked the list, we found there was a single individual missing—an infant just under a month old.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: The Imperial Guard searched the Grand Preceptor's mansion thoroughly today, but found no traces of the baby.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: A newborn could not have run off by herself.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: Someone went through the trouble to whisk her away.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: Your Highness need not worry. The Imperial Guard will find her.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: Earlier today, the Minister of Justice requested a meeting.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: He seeks His Highness's advice on this series of cases.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: Handle them... according to the Laws of Yan.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: I'll tell him.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: Where is my elder brother now?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: According to our reports, he left the capital just half an hour ago. Some of the Imperial Guard have defected with him.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: The soldiers guarding the city did not dare to stop them, without orders to do so.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: Indeed... I never ordered them to keep him in Baizao.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: He was unwilling to stay and left everyone behind.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: How many Imperial Guardsmen went with him?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: Eighteen.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: Even after committing such an unforgivable crime, my elder brother can still send the Grand Preceptor to die in his place; he can still command the unwavering loyalty of these eighteen deathsworn.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: How many courtiers are still devoted to him? How many still hope that he will retake the throne?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: Yet it is Your Highness who now sits on the throne, not him. Therefore, it falls upon Your Highness to ensure Yan's eternal prosperity.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: All castes of Yan may afford hesitation and uncertainty... save Your Highness.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: It's been so long since I've left this palace... Grand Commandant, tell me——
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: Has the spring rain yet ceased, in Baizao?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: The rain may stop whenever Your Highness desires.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: If Your Highness has changed your mind, you yet have time to stop them.
attributes.name: Grand Commandant

attributes.content: ...I'm exhausted.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: The Imperial Kitchen has prepared some babao soup and shredded bamboo shoots. If Your Highness desires?
attributes.name: Attendant

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Curtain

attributes.content: There... there...
attributes.name: Gentle Woman

attributes.content: Don't cry. We're on our way home. We're almost there.
attributes.name: Gentle Woman

attributes.content: Pick up the pace, please... if you could.
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: It's raining too hard. And I can't see too well. Couldn't go any faster, at this rate...
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: How much farther to the next stage station?
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: At least thirty li...
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: Brother, just how urgent is your business... that you'd bring your whole family along to travel on a night like this?
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: Please... just go faster.
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: Ahhh! Ahhh!! What the——
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: *Yanese exclamation* What's somebody doing out here in the wilderness at this hour?
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: The man looks around, but the endless rain blocks his view. It is too dark for him to see anything.
We'll have to get out here.
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: Sir, I'll give you all the money I have. Take your carriage to the next stage station. If anyone asks, do not tell them you carried passengers with a baby tonight.
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: I beseech you, good sir.
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: But.... what... huh?!
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: Where are you going in this weather?
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: We'll follow the path through the northern woods.
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: Ahhhh!!!!!
attributes.name: Panicked Woman

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Anxious Man

attributes.content: The baby...
attributes.name: Panicked Woman

attributes.content: The baby is gone...
attributes.name: Panicked Woman

attributes.content: It's... it's her.
attributes.name: Silent Old Man

attributes.content: The baby is sleeping soundly in her cradle, oblivious to the mud and blood on her face.
I did everything you asked.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: I know their methods, and I know how to answer them. Don't worry. I won't allow any blood to stain you.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: Good sir, I have no way to repay your kindness.
attributes.name: Silent Old Man

attributes.content: No. You need not thank me. I did not do this for you.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: She's done so much for me, yet what I do today will neither clear her name nor even begin to avenge her.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: I have no family and no affairs to settle after my death. I ask only one favor of you.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: Please, take this girl in.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: You need not tell her anything. Just let her grow up and live her life in peace.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: You know... if she stays here, it will be risky, with a greater possibility that this old case will be reopened.
attributes.name: Silent Old Man

attributes.content: But isn't that what you want?
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: We may be powerless to change the situation right now...
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: But if one day, be it three or four decades later, the truth is revealed...
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: All the blood shall not have been shed in vain.
attributes.name: Man with Bloody Hands

attributes.content: Right then. I swear it.
attributes.name: Silent Old Man
